contentList.content: You are the Chosen of both Eilistraee, the Dark Maiden, and Lurue, the Unicorn Queen. You blend the arts of the Sword Dancers of Eilistraee with the Druidic and Ranger traditions of Lurue's Silvermaids.

You are Eilistraee's Chosen. You gain a +6 Bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability Scores</LSTag>. When you roll a 1 on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. You also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag> for, and <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in, <LSTag Tooltip="Performance">Performance</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Insight">Insight</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Religion">Religion</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Arcana">Arcana</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="History">History</LSTag>.

You are Lurue's Chosen. <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag> no longer uses Wild Shape Charges, and you gain a +6 Bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Ability Scores</LSTag>. When you roll a 1 on an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. You also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag> for, and <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in, <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AnimalHandling">Animal Handling</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Survival">Survival</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Nature">Nature</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Investigation">Investigation</LSTag>.

You know the Drow fighting style of bautha z'hin. You can no longer be struck by <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>, and you restore [1] of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="Movement">Movement</LSTag> when attacking a foe in melee.

You are a practitioner of the challenging Drow fighting style known as draa velve. When dual-wielding, your off-hand melee weapon gains a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and you add +[1] to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armor Class</LSTag>.

You have mastered the Drow fighting style of kyone veldrin. You are no longer affected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Darkness">Darkness</LSTag>.
You practice the Drow fighting style of kyorlin plynn. Once per short rest, you may <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarm</LSTag> an enemy or taunt them into attacking you.
You utilize the fighting style luth alur. You have a +2 bonus to all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made with Ranged weapons or spells.

You fight using the sweeping style of orb alur. Once per battle, you may attempt to strike up to 3 enemies in a cone before you. If hit, they also become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarmed</LSTag>. If your attack misses, they become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarmed</LSTag>.

Sargh'elgg is the most common Drow fighting style. While wielding only a single <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse Weapon</LSTag>, you add a +2 bonus to your weapon damage, and a +1 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>.
You use the ust sreen fighting style. You gain +10 bonus to your Initiative, and you cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>.

Allies automatically succeed Saving Throws against spells that require them.

Costs [1] Spellsong Charges per spell.

Increase the range of spells by 50%. Melee spells get a range of [3].

Costs [1] Spellsong Charges per spell.

Double the duration of conditions, summons, and surfaces caused by spells.

Costs [1] Spellsong Charge per spell.

Spells that only target 1 creature can target an additional creature.

Costs 1 Spellsong Charge per spell slot level used. Cantrips also cost 1 Spellsong Charge.
For spells that don't shoot a projectile, the targets need to be close enough together.

Targets of spells that require Saving Throws have Disadvantage on their first Saving Throw.

Costs [1] Spellsong Charges per spell.

Spells that cost an action cost a bonus action instead.

Costs [1] Spellsong Charges per spell.

You can cast spells while Silenced.

Costs [1] Spellsong Charges per spell.

When you cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IUM_CC_MagicMissile">Magic Missile (Cantrip)</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IUM_CC_BlueFlameBlade">Blue Flame Blade</LSTag>, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to the damage it deals.

When you cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IUM_CC_MagicMissile">Magic Missile (Cantrip)</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IUM_CC_BlueFlameBlade">Blue Flame Blade</LSTag>, you can push the creature up to [1] away from you.

Teleport to your target when you hit them with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IUM_CC_MagicMissile">Magic Missile (Cantrip)</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IUM_CC_BlueFlameBlade">Blue Flame Blade</LSTag>. Costs 1 Spellsong Charge per use.

Swap places with your target when you hit them with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IUM_CC_MagicMissile">Magic Missile (Cantrip)</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="IUM_CC_BlueFlameBlade">Blue Flame Blade</LSTag>. Costs 1 Spellsong Charge per use.
Fire [1] magical dart(s). They always hit their target.
Channel the power of your Magic Missile spell into your blade, coating it in blue-white flames. It deals an extra [1].
Summon Eilistraee's Moonfire around your main-hand weapon, causing it to emanate light.
Once per long rest, you may cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Darkness">Darkness</LSTag> without consuming a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Once per short rest, you may <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarm</LSTag> an enemy.
Once per short rest, you may taunt an enemy into attacking you. The enemy also becomes <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantaged</LSTag> on their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Strike at up to [1] enemies in a cone before you. If hit, they take [2] and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> for 3 turns, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarmed</LSTag>.

Cause your main-hand blade to sing. Its damage becomes magical, you add your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and you cannot be disarmed.
Conjure a silver, ethereal alicorn above your brow and fire it at a target.
Summon a spectral, dancing greatsword to attack your enemies. It deals [1].
Slice into a target with your dancing blade, dealing [1].
Eilistraee's Moonfire illuminates your main-hand weapon.
Taunted by a user of kyorlin plynn. Has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Your main-hand blade sings. Its damage becomes magical, you add your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and you cannot be disarmed.
Spend <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> to gain Spellsong Charges.
Spend a level [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> to gain [1] Spellsong Charge.
Spend a level [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> to gain [1] Spellsong Charges.
Spend Spellsong Charges to unlock a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Spend [1] Spellsong Charges to unlock a level [2] <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.

Channel Eilistraee's Spellsong to inspire you and your allies, adding your Charisma modifier to all of their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Channel Eilistraee's Spellsong to rally your allies and restore their health.
Channel Eilistraee's Spellsong to enthrall your enemies, preventing them from taking any actions.

Channel Eilistraee's Spellsong to shield you and your allies from harm, granting you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SANCTUARY">Sanctuary</LSTag>, and allowing you to regain the maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> possible when healed. You also gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and Death Saving Throws.
The number of times you can channel the power of Eilistraee's Spellsong per day.
